title: Just lost 750 rp or so
body: i had like about 1515rp or so on my account, i just purchased the ssw talon skin and my rp dropped to like 15 almost as if i double purchased the skin. any help would be appreciated. {{champion:91}}

replies.body: basically i was double charged for a 750 skin and ended up paying 1500 for it. idk if this is a visual bug or what but help would be appreciated

Hey KnewBear,

Can you try restarting your client and seeing if the price after you login again reflects the balance that you should have?
